common_keywords.description: Common keywords that appear frequently across video diffusion papers

Surveys & Benchmarks.description: Survey papers, benchmarks, and evaluation metrics for video generation

Text-to-Video Generation.description: Foundation models and methods for generating videos from text prompts

Image-to-Video Generation.description: Methods for animating still images into videos

Video Editing.description: Diffusion-based video editing, style transfer, and manipulation

Controllable Generation.description: Controllable video generation with motion, camera, pose, or layout guidance

Long Video Generation.description: Generating temporally consistent long-form videos beyond short clips

Human & Character Animation.description: Human-centric video generation including talking heads, dance, and character animation

World Models & Simulation.description: Video generation as world simulators and interactive environment generation

Video Super-Resolution & Enhancement.description: Video quality improvement, upscaling, restoration, and frame interpolation

Architecture & Efficiency.description: Architectural innovations (DiT, UNet), flow matching, and training/inference efficiency

3D-aware Video Generation.description: Video generation with 3D awareness, multi-view consistency, and 4D content creation

Audio & Multi-modal.description: Audio-driven and multi-modal conditioned video generation

Personalization & Customization.description: Personalized video generation with custom subjects, identities, or styles

Physical Understanding.description: Physics-aware video generation and dynamics modeling

Video Inpainting & Completion.description: Video inpainting, completion, outpainting, and temporal prediction

Applications.description: Domain-specific applications of video diffusion models
